ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] VP
ygData.msgSnippet: As tough as Naggy/Vox.... Some example of the yardtrash tat s around VP b4 u reached the named dragons.... Guardian Wurms Version 1 : On Death, it splits into
ygData.messageBody:
As tough as Naggy/Vox....

Some example of the yardtrash tat's around VP b4 u reached the named
dragons....

Guardian Wurms
Version 1 : On Death, it splits into 2 dragons which are the exact clone
of Naggy and Vox.
Version 2 : No magic, no ae. Only pure melee power. Double hits for
1400.
Version 3 : Double Hits for 650. Proc Resistable DT.
Version 4 : Double Hits for 650. Proc Reality Warp (port u to zone in
from anywhere in VP)

Raptors like mob : Think Scarlings with muscle...

Chrome Drakes : Think Wizzie Mob.

Tat's all I can remember offhand.


----- Original Message -----
From: "Alex Tan" <atan@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 11:32 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] VP


> I would say lvl 60??
>
> Its damn tough in VP and there is no point for you to go in at your
earlier
> age....
> As every single mob there is as tough as Naggy/Vox
>
> So I would say we should pass it and camping XP and other loots (if
> possible) at the same time.
>
> I think normally guildies will be able to help you on keys..... It happend
> in Divine Grace tho.
>
> Tiffa Dancinsword
> Lvl 55 Beguiler from Divine Grace
> Erolissi Marrs
>
